com.googlecode.jsendnsca.core.builders
Class MessagePayloadBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.jsendnsca.core.builders.MessagePayloadBuilder

public class MessagePayloadBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Used to construct a MessagePayload using a builder pattern e.g. MessagePayload payload = MessagePayloadBuilder .withHostname("localhost") .withLevel(Level.CRITICAL) .withServiceName("Test Service Name") .withMessage("Test Message") .create();

Since:
1.2
Author:
Raj.Patel
